page.title: 03EDUCATION IN SOUTH REIGATE
page.content: The Primary education in the area is organised on the basis of first schools (age range 5-8)of which there are three and Middle Schools (age range 8-12) of which there are two:St Luke's CE Middle and Woodhatch Middle.Both these schools have the low intake of approx 150 children each which can be attributed to 1. the demographic trend in which a falling birthrate during the past ten years coupled with the recession has meant a decliming junior school population. 2.the over provision of Primary school places within the Reigate area as a whole. As a consequence of the above St Luke's and Woodhatch Middle Schools will combine as one County School on the St Luke's site in September 1986.
